title: Short title
context: PART I. [OLD] UNIFORM ANATOMICAL GIFT ACT §§327-1 to 9 REPEALED. L 1988, c 267, §2. PART I. [OLD] UNIFORM ANATOMICAL GIFT ACT §§327-1 to 14 REPEALED. L 2008, c 122, §4. Note L 2008, c 9, §3 purports to amend repealed §327-1. [Part I.] REVISED UNIFORM ANATOMICAL GIFT ACT [§327-1] Short title. This part may be cited as the &ldquo;Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act&rdquo;. [L 2008, c 122, pt of §1]
